snippet.title: American Arcadia | Date Reveal Trailer | Coming to PC on November 15th
snippet.description:
The wait is over! American Arcadia is coming to Steam on November 15th. 

From the award-winning developers of Call of the Sea, American Arcadia is a unique single-player experience that combines two gameplay styles, a 2.5D platformer and a first-person puzzler. Discover the story of Trevor, an average citizen of Arcadia attempting to escape from the world's most popular reality TV show.

Sometimes a perfect life... is nothing but a perfect lie. 

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249040/American_Arcadia/
